data.name: Fantasy Grounds - The Undying (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
The Undying


This token pack contains 28 tokens. This pack contains a variety of ghosts and undead creatures.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Animated Armor
  • Blue Dragon Golem
  • 2 Death Masters
  • Demon Ivy Dark
  • Ghost
  • Ghost Dwarf
  • 2 Ghouls
  • Hell Mare
  • Lich Lord
  • Lich Purple
  • Ravenous Canibal
  • Skeletal Hound
  • Skeleton
  • Undead Alchemist
  • 5 Vampire Lords
  • Vampire Lord Armor Mount
  • Vampire Lord Hell Mare
  • 2 Zombies
  • Dragon Shadow
  • Vampire Hydra
  • Vampire Beast

Released on April 04, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
